title: June Diane Raphael
itunes:title: June Diane Raphael
description:
Actress, comedian, screenwriter, producer, author and Whitney’s Super Friend June Diane Raphael (Grace and Frankie, New Girl, Big Mouth, The High Note) is on the pod to talk period cups, pube toupees, and vaginal anatomy. June is also founder of The Jane Club, an online collective for awesome women that offers amazing talks and networking opportunities.  For 50% off your first month of membership at the Jane Club, go to https://www.janeclub.com/shop/monthly-membership and input code GOODFORYOU at checkout.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
